author: Nick Nairn
method: Scatter the freshly ground black pepper and shredded basil leaves on the mozzarella ball.  Wrap the seasoned ball in the prosciutto slices. Heat a little olive oil in a non-stick frying pan and fry the wrapped mozzarella for a few minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp and golden.  Serve.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper,  shredded basil leaves,  1 ball of fresh mozzarella,  2 slices of prosciutto,  olive oil, for drizzling
